languageKey.label: Request
URL path and query (e.g. index.php?id=123). Empty for root request.
The query will be combined with the instance-url to form the requested URL.
Milliseconds for warning
If the request takes longer than the selected milliseconds a warning will be displayed.
Milliseconds for error
If the request takes longer than the selected milliseconds an error will be displayed.

expected Regular Expressions
Add regular expressions that should match the HTTP-Response. Each line is checked separately with preg_match().

__HEADER-NAME__ __COMPARISON-OPERATOR__ __EXPECTED_VALUE__
Exemples: - status:200 (status is 200) - status:< 404 (status is smaller than 404)
The following comparison Operators are allowed: - : Value equals the - :< Value is bigger than - :> Value is smaller than - := Value equals - :Age:< http header is interpreted as Timestamp and is smaller than - :Age:> http header is interpreted as Timestamp and is greater than
